title: Litany In Honour Of St. Kateri Tekakwitha
content:
LITANY IN HONOUR OF
SAINT KATERI TEKAKWITHA
(For private use only.)
Lord have mercy on us.
Christ have mercy on us.
Lord have mercy on us. Christ, hear us.
Christ, graciously hear us.
God, the Father of Heaven,
have mercy on us.
God the Son, Redeemer of the world,
have mercy on us.
God the Holy Ghost,
have mercy on us.
Saint Kateri, lily of purity,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, consoler of the heart of Jesus,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, bright light for all Indians,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, courage of the afflicted,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, lover of the cross of Jesus,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, flower of fortitude for the persecuted,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, unshakable in temptations,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, full of patience in suffering,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, keeper of your virginity in persecutions,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, leader of many Indians to the true faith
through your love for Mary,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, who loved Jesus in the Blessed Sacrament,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, lover of penance,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, who traveled many miles to learn the faith,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, steadfast in all prayer,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, who loved to pray the rosary for all people,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, example to your people in all virtues,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, humble servant to the sick,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, who by your love of humility,
gave joy to the angels,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, your holy death gave strength to all Indians
to love Jesus and Mary,
pray for us.
Saint Kateri, whose scarred face in life became beautiful after death,
pray for us.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Spare us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Graciously hear us, O Lord.
Lamb of God, Who takest away the sins of the world,
Have mercy on us.
Let us pray.
O Jesus, Who didst give Saint Kateri to the Indians
as an example of purity,
teach all men to love purity,
and to console Thine Immaculate Mother Mary through the lily,
Saint Kateri Tekakwitha,
and Thy Holy Cross,
Amen.
Saint Kateri Tekakwitha,
pray for us.
